Commission an Illustrated Holy Book
Books are expensive; a finely illustrated book is even more so. Regardless, as a faithful follower of {1_Religion}, you should obtain a copy.[NEWLINE]

[NEWLINE]Rewards:
Hold a Holy Festival
Truly this has been a great era! Let us show our gratitude! Let us hold a grand festival in honour of the Gods![NEWLINE]
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: The bonuses you receive with increase with era and religious unity within the empire; currently your religious unity is at {1_Percent}%
Acquire the Tripitaka

The Buddhist scriptures, the Tripitaka, can take up to 40 separate books to contain. Without an easy way to reproduce them, they are naturally expensive and hard to come by. Nonetheless, we should try to acquire a set ourselves.[NEWLINE]
Hold a Buddhist Council
The Sangha have grown lax; interpretations of the Dhamma vary greatly between different monks. This is unacceptable. We must hold a council to resolve these matters and revitalise Buddhism.[NEWLINE]
Reform the Sangha

Buddhism has a tendency to mingle with local beliefs and incorporate them. We should remove these superstitious beliefs from the Buddhist monastic order and take this opportunity to bring the doctrines of Buddhism in line with our furthered understanding of the natural world.[NEWLINE]
Search for the New Dalai Lama
His Holiness the Dalai Lama has passed from this earth! Let us begin our search for his reincarnation that we might bring him to lead the Buddhist order once again.[NEWLINE]
Commission a Biblical Manuscript

The act of reproducing and illustrating the Holy Bible by hand is extensive and laborious; naturally this means the manuscript can be quite costly. This should be no barrier to obtaining a copy for ourselves however.[NEWLINE]
Appoint Church Leaders
The Church lacks men to lead it. We are in a position to correct this. Let us aid the Church in seeking out wise and godly men to appoint as the leaders of Christianity![NEWLINE]
Convene the Papal Conclave
The Catholic Church has been leaderless since the departure of our previous pope. The Papal Conclave must be convened so a new pope may be elected.[NEWLINE]
Call an Ecumenical Council
Many disagreements have arisen on doctrinal and disciplinary matters within the Church. These should be quickly resolved. A Ecumenical Council must be called.[NEWLINE]
Elect a new Patriarch
The seat of our patriarchate has remained empty since the death of our previous archbishop. The Holy Synod must convene and elect a new patriarch.[NEWLINE]
Write a Confession of Faith

Our churches have a long history of composing Confessions of Faith; formal declarations of belief. Though many serve as theses for debate, others seek unity between groups on controversial doctrines. Let us draft our own Confession in an effort to formalize doctrinal standards.[NEWLINE]
Gather the Four Books and Five Classics

The Fours Books and Five Classics are the ancient texts that comprise the teachings of our faith. We would have these sacred works gathered and secured within our possession, so that they may be forever safe and never blemished.[NEWLINE]
Perform the Grand Ceremony

The Grand Ceremony at the Temple of Confucius is a celebration of music, song, and dance in honour of Confucius. Sacrifice is offered and ritual is conducted to develop traditional culture and create a harmonious society. Let us support the temple by contributing to this year's festivities.[NEWLINE]
Commission a Sefer Torah

The production of a Sefer Torah is a momentous thing; each of its 304,805 letters must be rendered by hand and the standards that must be met for the Sefer Torah to be valid are strict and specific. The resulting scroll is of course sacred and costly.[NEWLINE]
Celebrate Passover
Passover is celebrated every year to commemorate the liberation of the Jewish people from slavery. Spend lavishly and make this year's celebration one to be remembered![NEWLINE]
Obtain a Qur'anic Manuscript

A Qur'an is a magnificent thing; the calligraphic style alone can be a marvel. Of course, the fact that there is no way to reproduce it except by hand means that a copy will not come cheaply.[NEWLINE]
Go on Hajj to the Holy City
Going on a pilgrimage is one of the pillars of Islam, and this is something every able bodied Muslim is expected to do once in his life.[NEWLINE]
Create the Bhagavad Gita

Our diverse faith, composed of many enlightened teachings on the ways of life and spirit, is an empowering force. We should synthesis these teachings into one scripture; the holy Bhagavad Gita, and unite our faithful beneath our common understandings.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player's majority religion must be Hinduism[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must not have researched Printing Press[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game[NEWLINE]Costs:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE]Rewards:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Faith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith
Hold a Diwali Feast

Diwali is the traditional Hindu harvest feast. It celebrates the triumph of light over darkness, good over evil and hope over despair. Take special care this year, and make this year's feast one to be remembered.[NEWLINE]
Compile the Kojiki

There are many songs and poems that honour the spirits, but none yet so great as would be a single chronicle containing all. This would be an expensive task, but one truly worthy of our time.[NEWLINE]
Rebuild the Ise-Jingu

The Ise-Jingu is one of our most sacred shrines, dedicated to the goddess Amaterasu and housing the sacred Yata no Kagami. Every 20 years we dismantle and rebuild the shrine as an act of renewal and purification. Let us hold festivals to celebrate the event and contribute to the rebuilding ceremony.[NEWLINE]
Initiate the Guru Granth Sahib

Gurus have since past, contributing their wisdom and knowledge to their successors for centuries. Now is the time to compile all Gurbani into one sacred volume, the likes of which would become the perpetual authority on our faith.[NEWLINE]
Gurpurab of Guru Nanak

Kartik Puranmashi has arrived and we celebrate the birth of our founder and spiritual leader Guru Nanak. Let us recite the sacred texts in our gurdwaras and hold a procession of song and swordsmanship to reaffirm our devotion.[NEWLINE]
Compile the Irk Bitig
Our shamans have received visions from Tengri Ülgen during their travels to the heavens. Let our scribes compile these omens so that they may guide us in times to come.[NEWLINE]
Sacrifice to the Yer-Sub
We must appease the spirits of nature and of our ancestors. Before we feast, let us hang the white ram from a tree and sacrifice the red horse to ensure the fertility of our cattle.[NEWLINE]
Patronise the compilation of the Daozang

The teachings of our sacred traditions are scattered throughout thousands of texts. Monks have long sought to compile these texts into one chronicle, but their efforts have thus far failed. It would be in keeping with the spirit of our traditions to patronise them in this endeavour.[NEWLINE]
Perform the Chiao

The Chiao is a rite of cosmic renewal which brings order and restores the balance of the universe and the community. Let us sponsor festivities and processions for the local villages, as our priests dedicate our offerings to the gods and ask them to bring us peace and prosperity.[NEWLINE]
Compose the Avesta

Our faith comprises of many hymns and texts espousing the goodness of Zoroaster, but they are not one, and lie across many sacred works. Praise be upon the good king that would compose these texts into one holy collection.[NEWLINE]
Celebrate Sadeh

At the start of the long winter we gather to celebrate Sadeh. Along our rivers and in our temples, let us light huge bonfires to assist the revival of the sun and its summer light as we fight off the demons of cold and darkness.[NEWLINE]
Hold a Great Blot
Hold a great blot together with your vassals and offer sacrifice to the gods of Valhalla for good harvests and success on the battlefield.[NEWLINE]
Heb-Sed Festival
Great Pharaoh, the time has come to hold a royal jubilee and renew your divine right of kingship. Let us race the Apis bull and offer sacrifice to Ma'at and Wadjit.[NEWLINE]
Prepare the Hecatomb

Let us prepare the 100 cattle needed to offer sacrifice to the patron deity of our great city. Afterwards we shall mix wine and sing a joyous paean so that the gods may take pleasure in our voices.[NEWLINE]
Celebrate the Akitu

A new half year has begun and your subjects are already preparing a festival to celebrate the sowing of the barley. Let us move the statute of Marduk from the great house and honour his victory of Tiamat, renewing our great city and asking Marduk’s blessings for the coming year.[NEWLINE]
Celebrate the Inti Raymi

The winter solstice is fast approaching and already your subjects have begun to organize dances and processions for the festival. We should prepare sacrifice for Inti and Pachamama to ensure a good harvest in the coming season.[NEWLINE]
Perform the Xiuhmolpilli
The Binding of the Years is approaching as our calendar completes its cycle. Our subjects should fast as the priests of Huehueteotl prepare the sacrifice to light the new sacred fire.[NEWLINE]
Midwinter Festival

The first new moon of the year symbolizes a time to give thanks to the spirits and renew our connection with them. Let us stir the ashes of our hearths and have the False Face cleanse the village before holding a great feast in honour of Hahgwehdiyu.[NEWLINE]
Organize a Father Dance
It is through dance and song that we direct the heart of the spirits. Let us gather and hold a round dance to give thanks to A'po for the coming season.[NEWLINE]
Kraal Sacrifice
Our sangoma fear that the amadholozi have grown displeased with our actions. We should sacrifice cattle in the umsamo of our chief to help placate and honour our ancestors.[NEWLINE]
Celebrate Samhain

The harvest season has come to an end and our people have begun feasting to celebrate the new year. Let us bring new fire into our houses as we put out the old, and allow our diviners to forecast the fate of the coming year.[NEWLINE]
Celebrate Makahiki

The Makahiki season has arrived and our warriors put down their spears to celebrate the new year. Let our priests offer ho'okupu to Lono, as our people feast and wrestle to prove their strength.[NEWLINE]
Symposium of the Sun

Let us hold a funerary feast to celebrate Ba'al Hamon's victory over Mot. Have our priests drink from the bronze cup and offer our children in sacrifice to ensure prosperity in the coming year.[NEWLINE]
Hold a Sun Dance

Our people wish to hold a sun dance to give thanks and renewal to the Great Spirit. Let our warriors pierce their skin and offer themselves as prayer for the benefit of their family and band.[NEWLINE]
Purulli Festival
My Lord, our land prospers and thrives as we approach the new year. Let Tarhun affirm your divine kingship as we celebrate his victory over Illuyanka.[NEWLINE]
Create a Nkisi
Our people strive for a closer connection to their ancestors. Let us create a vessel for the spirits to protect us and provide good fortune in the coming season.[NEWLINE]
Hold a Drum Ceremony
The noaidi can mediate between this world and the next. Let us hold a ceremony so that they may journey to saivo and negotiate with the spirits and forefathers to improve our fate.[NEWLINE]
Hold an Egungun Festival

Through drumming and dance our priests can become one with our ancestors to teach and guide our community. Let us hold a festival to honour the dead and assure our ancestors their place among the living.[NEWLINE]
Nguillatun Festival

During the full moon of harvest season, our community comes together to celebrate the Nguillatun and give thanks for our good fortune. Let the machi play the kultrun and pifilka to reestablish balance and heal the natural order.[NEWLINE]
